List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(limit = 10, releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE)

Arguments

limit

Number of events to list.
releases

Whether to include package releases.
archivals

Whether to include package archivals.

Value

List of events.

Examples

cran_events()
#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package      Version Title                                          
#>  + 2 hours btergm       1.9.4   Temporal Exponential Random Graph Models by ...
#>  + 2 hours c212         0.95    Methods for Detecting Safety Signals in Clin...
#>  + 4 hours pct          0.2.1   Propensity to Cycle Tool                       
#>  + 4 hours rticles      0.8     Article Formats for R Markdown                 
#>  + 4 hours tinytex      0.13    Helper Functions to Install and Maintain 'Te...
#>  + 4 hours xaringan     0.10    Presentation Ninja                             
#>  + 4 hours xfun         0.7     Miscellaneous Functions by 'Yihui Xie'         
#>  + 4 hours BLPestimatoR 0.2.9   Performs a BLP Demand Estimation               
#>  + 4 hours ecoval       1.2.4   Procedures for Ecological Assessment of Surf...
#>  + 4 hours metafor      2.1-0   Meta-Analysis Package for R                    
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When  Package         Version Title                                         
#>  - 1 day planor          1.4-1   Generation of Regular Factorial Designs       
#>  - 1 day packagefinder   0.1.2   Comfortable Search for R Packages on CRAN D...
#>  - 1 day nestedRanksTest 0.2     Mann-Whitney-Wilcoxon Test for Nested Ranks   
#>  - 1 day kmi             0.5.4   Kaplan-Meier Multiple Imputation for the An...
#>  - 1 day intReg          0.2-8   Interval Regression                           
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package Version Title                                               
#>  + 2 hours btergm  1.9.4   Temporal Exponential Random Graph Models by Boots...
#>  + 2 hours c212    0.95    Methods for Detecting Safety Signals in Clinical ...
#>  + 4 hours pct     0.2.1   Propensity to Cycle Tool                            
#>  + 4 hours rticles 0.8     Article Formats for R Markdown                      
#>  + 4 hours tinytex 0.13    Helper Functions to Install and Maintain 'TeX Liv...
